hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT COUNTRY.EBPL_CODE COUNTRY_CODE, COUNTRY.EBPL_NAME_CN COUNTRY_NAME_CN, COUNTRY.EBPL_NAME_EN COUNTRY_NAME_EN, PROVINCE.EBPL_CODE PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE.EBPL_NAME_CN PROVINCE_NAME_CN, PROVINCE.EBPL_NAME_EN PROVINCE_NAME_EN, CITY.EBPL_CODE CITY_CODE, CITY.EBPL_NAME_CN CITY_NAME_CN, CITY.EBPL_NAME_EN CITY_NAME_EN, DISTRINCT.EBPL_CODE DISTRINCT_CODE, DISTRINCT.EBPL_NAME_CN DISTRINCT_NAME_CN, DISTRINCT.EBPL_NAME_EN DISTRINCT_NAME_EN FROM EB_PLACE COUNTRY, EB_PLACE PROVINCE, EB_PLACE CITY, EB_PLACE DISTRINCT
WHERE COUNTRY.EBPL_TYPE = 'PLACE_COUNTRY' AND COUNTRY.EBPL_IS_ABLE='ENABLE' AND PROVINCE.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE=COUNTRY.EBPL_CODE AND PROVINCE.EBPL_TYPE = 'PLACE_PROVINCE' AND PROVINCE.EBPL_IS_ABLE='ENABLE' AND CITY.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE=PROVINCE.EBPL_CODE AND CITY.EBPL_TYPE = 'PLACE_CITY' AND CITY.EBPL_IS_ABLE='ENABLE' AND DISTRINCT.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE=CITY.EBPL_CODE AND DISTRINCT.EBPL_TYPE = 'PLACE_DISTRICT' AND DISTRINCT.EBPL_IS_ABLE='ENABLE' << AND DISTRINCT.EBPL_CODE LIKE :distrinctCode>>
